guide.img: Every time you start working with the turtle, the first step will be to create our turtle window to work with. let's learn how to do that
Two things are done here :  *   we are creating a variable called wn to signify a window  *  we are going to call the Screen function in turtle to initialize a new screen
Once we define a screen, we can modify it as we like. lets us try setting the background colour of the screen to pink using the bgcolour function
